sentences.en: But why expend resources on what is gone and cannot be changed?
sentences.cn: 可是,为什么还要在耗费资源关注已经过去的和无法再改变的东西 呢 ?

sentences.en: Children expend a lot of energy and may need more high-energy food than adults.
sentences.cn: 孩子们消耗很多能量，可能比成年人需要更多高能量的食物。

sentences.en: Don't expend all your energy on such a useless job.
sentences.cn: 不要把你的精力全花在这无益的工作上.

sentences.en: Even the effort that some people expend.
sentences.cn: 即使是一些人所花费的努力.

sentences.en: Every effort seemed to expend her spirit's force ( George Meredith )
sentences.cn: 每一次努力看上去都耗尽了她的精神力量 ( 乔治梅雷迪恩 )

sentences.en: I think it is safe to say that very few students expend the effort to do quality work in school.
sentences.cn: 我认为可以肯定地说学校里很少有学生肯为学好功课下功夫。

sentences.en: If you give up exercise, your muscles shrink and fat increases. By the same token, if you expend more energy you will lose fat.
sentences.cn: 停止锻炼会使肌肉萎缩、脂肪增加。同样，如果花更多的精力锻炼，就会减掉脂肪。

sentences.en: It looks like you're ready to expend.
sentences.cn: 看来,你准备把它做大了.

sentences.en: MDA make component's reuse expend to model's reuse.
sentences.cn: mda的 出现,使软件复用由组件复用扩展到模型复用.

sentences.en: Objective : To expend our experience of systemic family therapy.
sentences.cn: 目的: 探讨系统式家庭治疗.

sentences.en: Thank you General Manager, for you expend in your labor.
sentences.cn: 谢谢你总经理, 你辛辛苦苦忙忙碌碌白费力.

sentences.en: They expend all their strength in trying to climb out.
sentences.cn: 他们费尽全力想爬出来.

sentences.en: What is adjusting industry difference to expend the basis of rate?
sentences.cn: 调整行业差别费率的依据是什么?

sentences.en: Which bank or which kinds of means, does hand foreword expend lowest?
sentences.cn: 哪个银行或者哪种方式, 手序费最低 呢 ?

words.tran_cn: 可消费的；排出的；不重复使用的；可牺牲的

trans.tran_en: to use or spend a lot of energy etc in order to do something

trans.tran_cn: 花费， 消费； 消耗
trans.tran_en: to use or spend a lot of energy etc in order to do something
